txt.en: 'I - thank you. I was overwhelmed. It is all too awful!'

'A great flood of well well-wishers has been flooding the Houses of Healing, [placeholder]. I would swear there are three of them to every wounded soldier! They must be turned away - the healers and herbalists are tripping over them to tend the patients!\n\n'Would you go inside and outside the Houses of Healing and shoo away as many as you can?'
'Yes, of course. The healers come first. I will go.'
'You need not harry me. I was just on my way out!'
Torchún has asked you to disperse visiting well-wishers inside and outside the Houses of Healing, on the Sixth Circle of Minas Tirith.
'And who are you, pray tell, to order me about? No matter, I will leave.'
Return to Torchún
Too many visiting well-wishers around the Houses of Healing are getting in the way of the healers' work and need to be shooed away.
'You have sent a good number of them away? You have my thanks, [placeholder].'
'What? Where am I? I have been dazed. I had better be going!'
DNT dispersed visitor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Disperse well-wishers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dispersed well-wishers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should return to Torchún outside of the Houses of Healing and let him know you have dispersed a number of visiting well-wishers.
'Fine, fine, I'll move along.'
DNT disperse visitors ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I only wished to see my friend. I'll be going now.'
'You may shoo me away now, but I will return tomorrow!'
'I only wanted to help!'
'I am ashamed. I never meant to get in the healers' way!'
'If I must go... then I suppose I will!'
A Worrisome Crowd
'I will go. I could not find him here, anyway....'
